ower","type":"address"}],"name":"liquidation","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"ltv","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_shares","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"address","name":"_user","type":"address"}],"name":"repayWithSelectedToken","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"_lendingPool","type":"address"}],"name":"setLendingPool","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_amount","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"address","name":"_user","type":"address"}],"name":"supplyLiquidity","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"shares","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"totalBorrowAssets","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"totalBorrowShares","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"totalReserveAssets","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"totalSupplyAssets","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"totalSupplyShares","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}]," 24051b70865bd06be","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://9f790d6dac95de66ca35135c97946cbe97082555f56186762bae3da8fe2d0256","dweb:/ipfs/QmZBVeh4xzjsi7kfWeEFR87uWWEaxSpDtZTfu69qnu6rsG"]},"src/interfaces/IIsHealthy.sol":{"keccak256":"0x35d26f4652ee95e468f8ba27319c665813a392cbfcc616e3802e3f3efbd62f5f","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://c6c9b9bbb3d02af0633996111f8ffed09b7b993c56f24a670c76e50ba2ba59ac","dweb:/ipfs/QmSvJ5BrXL3VTMX9rW8GQVXPbB8smRoZKjCr5ASpwHKpcP"]},"src/interfaces/IPosition.sol":{"keccak256":"0xc35a53c49caba42588c8f77925f3829fa758d9dba289d04bd9936aa05bc0b551","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://068a82b19051dd74ef8230b9a1d02b04b3a9726450ab094b754be5632c6056ec","dweb:/ipfs/QmV1jJhfEnYh5vEZfDgiGRxFcpc3eVmMvzuCoqh5AAzEbz"]},"src/interfaces/IPositionDeployer.sol":{"keccak256":"0xa0d2c9ea062aa29782ba4a39149f3780490d97cd1e100b4d0c3a1f8f290f0070","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://9c2750e320c3b0b017af35c301fa4445dde4197fdb09d99f35cdada3a8deb865","dweb:/ipfs/QmNq5HTK54FMJ3AT2SrEsRT5VrFB6MGXfrp7zeXxU16RTW"]},"src/interfaces/IProtocol.sol":{"keccak256":"0x5222e638761518b1c0816b63c0db814472268b2947485ee3b57db424ca64ca92","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://15c1af9e4f06582376d8729ad2eb82a2e439514ab8d7bed49a799a611056d5b5","dweb:/ipfs/QmQtwxDdUpKLUZPZbWRB6eiE6bKBVUryUhsiWXADhChxaw"]}},"version":1}

accrueInterest().details: Calculates interest based on elapsed time since last accrual and adds it      to both totalSupplyAssets and totalBorrowAssets. This increases the value      of supply shares and borrow shares proportionally.

borrowDebt(uint256,address).details: Only callable by lending pool. Mints borrow shares to the user and applies      a 0.1% protocol fee. Checks maximum utilization to prevent over-borrowing.

params._amount: The amount of assets to borrow
params._user: The address of the user borrowing

returns.protocolFee: The protocol fee taken (0.1% of borrow amount)
returns.shares: The number of borrow shares minted
returns.userAmount: The amount user receives after fee

constructor.details: Sets up the initial state with lending pool, factory, and market parameters

params._borrowToken: The address of the borrow token
params._collateralToken: The address of the collateral token
params._factory: The address of the factory contract
params._lendingPool: The address of the lending pool contract
params._ltv: The loan-to-value ratio in basis points (e.g., 8000 = 80%)

createPosition(address).details: Only callable by lending pool. Deploys a new Position contract via factory      and stores it in addressPositions mapping. Reverts if position already exists.

returns._0: The address of the newly created position contract

liquidation(address).details: Only callable by lending pool. Checks if position is liquidatable via health check,      accrues interest before liquidation, and clears borrower's position.      Liquidator receives most of the collateral while a portion goes to protocol.

params._borrower: The address of the borrower being liquidated

returns._0: userBorrowAssets The total borrow assets of the borrower
returns._1: liquidationBonus The amount allocated to protocol
returns._2: userPosition The address of the borrower's position contract

repayWithSelectedToken(uint256,address).details: Only callable by lending pool. Converts borrow shares to assets and burns them.

params._shares: The number of borrow shares to burn
params._user: The address of the user repaying

returns._0: borrowAmount The amount of assets repaid
returns._1: userBorrowSharesAfter The user's remaining borrow shares
returns._2: totalBorrowSharesAfter The total borrow shares after repayment
returns._3: totalBorrowAssetsAfter The total borrow assets after repayment

supplyLiquidity(uint256,address).details: Only callable by lending pool. Uses a shares-based accounting system.      First depositor receives shares equal to amount (1:1).      Subsequent depositors receive shares proportional to their contribution.

params._amount: The amount of assets to supply
params._user: The address of the user supplying liquidity

returns.shares: The number of shares minted to the user

withdrawLiquidity(uint256,address).details: Only callable by lending pool. Converts shares back to assets proportionally.      Ensures sufficient liquidity remains after withdrawal.

params._shares: The number of shares to burn
params._user: The address of the user withdrawing liquidity

addressPositions(address).notice: Mapping of user to their position contract address

createPosition(address).notice: Creates a new position contract for a user

lendingPool().notice: Address of the lending pool contract

repayWithSelectedToken(uint256,address).notice: Repays borrowed assets by burning borrow shares

setLendingPool(address).notice: Sets a new lending pool address

supplyLiquidity(uint256,address).notice: Supplies liquidity to the pool and mints shares to the user

totalBorrowAssets().notice: Total borrowed assets from the pool

totalReserveAssets().notice: Total reserve assets in the pool

totalSupplyAssets().notice: Total supply assets in the pool

userBorrowShares(address).notice: Mapping of user to their borrow shares

userSupplyShares(address).notice: Mapping of user to their supply shares

withdrawLiquidity(uint256,address).notice: Withdraws liquidity from the pool by burning shares
